I GOT MY BRACES OFF TODAY! OMG I AM SO HAPPY LIKE WHOA! I CAN'T WAIT TO SHOW YOU ALL!

OMFG THAT FALL FLING WAS SOOOOOO MUCH FUN!!! OH IT WAS G-R-E-A-T! ME AND ETHAN DANCED LIKE THE WHOLE TIME AND I DANCED WITH OUR GROUP!! OH IT WAS A BLAST! ETHAN GAVE ME A BUNCH OF LIL KISSES ON MY CHEEK<3 IM TOTALLY GOIN TO THE ONE AT SOUTH!

 

WOW I HAD SO MUCH FUN!

 

<3 u all    --    <33manda<33

Ethan loved his Tony Stewart hat! yay <3.....hes amazing.....Today is our one month jsut to let you all know lol!!!!!

The dance is tomorrow! WOOTWOOT whoa-billy im so effing excited! haha i laugh when ppl ask me "whos billy?" haha lol its just something i say...my brother said then i jsut always say it now...it like stuck...its kinda like whoa-nelly

 

*I want to go back to that moment in the garage. It was just me and Ethan. Holding eachother and kissing. That was a great night*

I got to my Grammy and Grampa's house around 6:30 AM yesterday. I babysat their lil puppy. Lizzy came over their house for 10ish and Kelly went over for 1ish...I think lol. Lady (the puppy) is soooo cute!~! My Grammy gave me $20. I was like whoa dude...kuz I didnt think she was paying me. So we were there until like  4:30ish.  The worst part was when I stepped in dog shit. Ya that wasnt cool.

After that we chilled with all of the guys! At first it was just Andy and Chris. Ethan couln't come out for a bit. Then we went to Denellys. ( I think im getting sick of always eatting there...) Then we all chilled in the garage kuz it was a lil bit cold out and Lizzy has chairs in there so it was all good. Haha I just sat on Ethan's lap. Of course :) Ya it was fun in there lol. Good times with thoz truth or dares. Then we all (Kelly, Lizzy, Ethan, Andy, and Justin) played hide and seek. It was fun haha. It was guys vs. girls. The guys kept scaring us haha. Lizzy and Kelly- The flag scared us too! Haha that was funny.

 

*** I got Ethan's present today for our 1 month on Nov. 9th!! Heehee and I got myself some more body spray (Joe Boxers- Berries smell) and eyeliner.

"I don't like to be alone in the night
and I don't like to hear I'm wrong when I'm right
and I don't like to have the rain on my shoes
but I do love you
but I do love you

I don't like to see the sky painted grey
and I don't like when nothings going my way
and I don't like to be the one with the blues
but I do love you
but I do love you

Love everything about the way you're loving me
the way you lay you're head upon my shoulder when you sleep
and I love to kiss you in the rain
I love everything you do, oh I do

I don't like to turn the radio on
just to find out, missed my favorite song
and I don't like to be the last with the news
but I do love you
but I do love you"

Okay I will try and make this short.

Concert - It was totally amazing! The Honorary Title and The Format opened for "Switchfoot"! They were all so good! I love the guys hair in The Honorary Title!!! Kelly, Lizzy and I all bought T-shirts! I wore mine today....Black isnt my fave color for clothing but I still love the shirt! We listened to Switchfoot on the way there and on the way home! haha dude! lol Then me and lizzy got Wendys after we checked in at her house. Kelly couldent sleepover Lizzys kuz she had to work the next day! But yea we had clear view of all the bands! Haaha these dorks in front of us danced wicked weird! Like whoa...some guy was like humping the air and they all snapped their fingers and bobbed their heads to hard lol haha. They were just weirdos. And some blonde girl slept...who sleeps at a concert!? Ahh the concert was amazing tho! If u have any questions just comment heehee!

Halloween- It was okay...my friends and I got egged!.! Yea thoz lil fuckers! God it went all in Kelly's hair, in my pillow case, and everywhere! People are so stupid sometimes!

My cold - I lost my voice wicked bad today! Its scary lol! I couldnt sing in chorale so i mouthed it and tride to sing but bad notes woudl coem out so I stoped...Oh it better go away!

GUESS WUT- OUR "LIVESTRONG" BRACELTS CAME IN TODAY! WOOTWOOT! IT TOOK SO LONG BUT IT WAS WORTH IT LOL! MELISSA AND I WERE SO HAPPY!


***comment*** yea no one ever does besides bea and kelly

So tomorrow is the switchfoot concert! wootwoot..I am goin to lizzy's for 1 o'clock...they open the doors at 7 and it begins at 8...i dunno when are getting there tho.....and ethan said he is goin to stop by an chill for a bit :)   <3

then halloween! that will be fun... :)


too bad i have this effing cold! err...i wish itd go away by tomorrow lol ya rite...haahaa ethan said he will cheer me up tomorrow and help me forget that i have a cold....

this year is goin really great on friens wise...the teachers are okay i guess the work sux but im gettin use to it...friends help the days go by...its sux that i wont have some of the ppl in my classes for sem2 tho bummer


<3manda

anywho

OMG THEN SATURDAY IS THE SWITCHFOOT CONCERT! OMG AHHHH!! IM SO EFFING EXCITED! I JUST KEEP TELLING MYSELF THIS WEEK "DUDE SWTICHFOOT CONERT!!" OMG! ME KELLY LIZZY- BBFL! LOVE U GUYS! WE HAVE BEEN PLANING THIS SINCE THE BEGINNING OF THE SUMMER!! woot woot......then after the concert im sleeping over lizzys!...o ya i have to call the place about a camera..can we bring them in or no? hmm

sunday is halloween! should be funfunfun!

and o ya im thinking about going to this kuz they said freshmen are welcome: 

"A college fair will be held at NHS North in the gymnasium on Monday, November 1st from 7 to 8:30"    anyone wanna maybe go with me dude??

luvs    <3manda

Post anything that you want, and post it anonymously. Anything. A story, a secret, a confession, a fear, a love -- anything. Be sure to post anonymously and honestly. Post twice if you'd like. Then, put this in your LJ to see what your friends (and perhaps others who you don't even realize read your LJ) have to say...

wow that took a long time

Today was the best day ever! Okay 1st I will start off with last night heehee...It was me, kelly, lizzy, ethan, and chris (lizzy's bf) all hanging out...well eric was there too but he was being a major jerk...ask the ppl who where there..I cant believe he was like that...well anyways me lizzy and kelly and ethan and chris and justin all went to Denellys for dinner...everyone already had their foor and me and ethan were inside still..(we all ate outside on thoz tables kuz it was so nice out) and we both were standing next to eachother near the soda machines...and some guy reached over him to get a number..and he was like "oh sry are u 2 in line" and were like nope we are just waiting for our food..and the wife of the guy goes "ya especially on a 1st date"...me and ethan both looked at eachother haha..it was great...and i guess we had a study togethere in 7th grade but i didnt remember lol..but he did!!

then today was even better!!! <3 ... I got to ride on his pegs on his biek....it was so much fun!! then we went to park..and all day lizzy and chris were like "ye we think u 2 shoudl go out!" and me and ethan talked more..then we went to another park..i rode on his pegs again...and me and him sat next to eachother..lizzy was on the bench too and chirs was on his bike...then we went to another bench kuz chris and lizzy were like guys go to that bench and talk..and they were like ethan ask her out...and guess what Ethan and I are going out! hes such a gentlemen!! like seriously he is! hes so nice..and he makes me so happy....when we were walking home tho me and ethan were holding hands and guess who drove by? me and kelly's grampa!! i was like "o sittt" lol....i said hi tho..lol he was going to..but i love my grampa haha i was like "hi grampa!!!" lol anyways

then tonight kelly, lizzy, ethan, chris and i all went to the movies! we saw "taxi" omg that movie is so funny!!! Ethan and I held hands like all day today and at the movies! he had his arm around me too at the movies..and when we were holding hands he'd rub mine and i would rub his...but stupid me forgot a pen so i couldnt give him my number lol..but lizzy is going to kuz they live close and stuff..and after the movie we gave eachother this huge hug!!

today was just an amazign day!! and then i had Chicken and Chips for dinner so that made it even better!

and yr prolly wondering about eric...he just really hurt my feelings and was being mean..and that killed it there...and i am soooo happy with ethan!

<3manda

ps: im gonna tell u all this again in school lol....dude when are walking in the morning i will...

:)

But its so good.

I GAVE ERIC A BIGGGGGG HUG TODAY! and i saw him like 20 times! yay...and all of u got to see him so that was good...yea and all of my effing SS class lol...i have such bad timing...

a kid- "amanda i heard u like some one who is it?"
me- "Umm...all im saying is that he has blonde hair and has on a green shirt today"
kid- "who is it?!"
me- "im not saying."

*eric walks by my SS class as im talkin...i blush and they all know its him kuz of his hair and shirt haha damn did i blush* he didnt notice tho...good thing eric didnt haha

kid-"thats him i bet! is it?"
me- *turning around*

You always want the things you can't have. I know my "true love" is out there some where in the world. Im just scared I wont find him. My mom and dad fell in love in high school. I wonder every day if I will. I wish I could find a guy like the ones in, A Walk to Remember and The Notebook....

and right when u think u find someone cool and worth getting to know....he might be moving away...far away....really far away..

i hope u dont move....im just getting to know u...and im sad for u...

and to that person- im really sorry....i will deff. be open for chattin tomorrow...remember *main stairs in the morning* ...and a hug



<3manda
